SageTVPlugin.Name: CPU Meter
SageTVPlugin.Description: Simple CPU meter for Sage7+. Puts a bar graph in the header that displays the CPU usage.
SageTVPlugin.Author: tmiranda
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
Version 1.20 - Moved hosting from Google Code to GitHub. No functionality changes.
Version 1.10 - Make use of STV hook to increase compatibility with other Plugins that need to put an icon in the header.
Version 1.03 - Fixed a bug that caused a solid yellow line on Linux systems.
Version 1.02 - Internal version that was never released.
Version 1.01 - Fixed bug that caused bar to not show red if CPU usage exceeds 90%.
Version 1.00 - Initial release.
